title: Necroscope V1 (Restored)
description:
One for the horror lovin' folks. Issue five didn't have a cover (although I realized later that CBDB had a good sized image I could have used) so I moved the covers or issues 1-4 to the front and put the guts together like a TPB (which does actually exist).

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Issues 1-5 of 'Necroscope V1' (TPB) (Restored)

Malibu Comics, 1992-1993, 127 pages total

Written and Adapted by Brian Lumley, Martin Powell

Illustrated by Daerick Gross

This is an adaptation of the book by Brian Lumley
